participant_1.background:
I sometimes spend too much time procrastinating on my homework.
i want to learn how to fly an airplane.
My school life is going well, though I am a bit tired from working so many hours at the food pantry.
i like camping and the outdoors in general.
My most prized possession is my running shoes because they have helped me to stay healthy and active throughout the years.

participant_2.background:
I'm a go-getter and always looking for ways to challenge myself.
i work at a vet.
I prefer not to have pets since my home is my sanctuary and I need it to be a quiet place.
now i am a fixture on a weekly telenovela.
i stay active.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing?
Good thanks! I'm always on the go so it's hard to find time to relax, but I'm getting better at it.
I hear ya! I like to go camping and spend time in the outdoors, but I also work a lot so it can be hard to fit it all in.
That sounds like fun! I love the outdoors, but I'm a bit of a neat freak so I prefer my home to be a quiet place.
I totally get that! I like my space to be clean and organized too. What kind of work do you do?
I'm a vet, so I'm always on my feet and moving around. It's a lot of work, but I love it.
That's awesome! I'm always impressed by people who work in the medical field. It takes a lot of dedication.
Thanks! It can be challenging, but it's so rewarding to be able to help animals.
I'm sure it is! I'm a student, so I'm always on the lookout for ways to help out in my community. I volunteer at a food pantry a few times a week.
That's great! It's so important to give back. I try to do as much as I can, but it can be hard to find the time.
I know what you mean! I'm always feeling like I'm running out of time.
Me too! But it's important to make time for the things that are important to us.
I agree! That's why I try to make time for my hobbies, even though it can be hard.
I'm glad to hear that! It's important to have a balance in life.
